channel.title: Comments on: Percentage Change in Federal Debt, 1958-2012

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2013/04/15/percentage-change-in-federal-debt-1958-2012/#comment-4027">Elizabeth Scott</a>.
Go for it :-)
If you want to add some crazy graph issues go back all the way to 1790. In 1838 the percentage change was over 800.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Elizabeth Scott.

Go for it ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Elizabeth Scott
item.dc:creator: Elizabeth Scott
item.description: Seeing as how this is a rate of change, this is actually a graph of the derivative of the function then. This sounds like a problem for my AP Calc kids!
item.content:encoded: Seeing as how this is a rate of change, this is actually a graph of the derivative of the function then. This sounds like a problem for my AP Calc kids!
